name: words are hard but know that i love you
name_original: words are hard but know that i love you
description:
Push the hearts to your friend to cheer them up!

Features:

  • Bouncing hearts!
  • A friend
  • 13 levels
  • Voxel art by yours truly

A short game I made with DungeonScript in 4 hours for a friend who was feeling sad.
